card.description: A dataset of survey responses gathered by Slovak students aged 18-21 at FSEV UK. Most responses are rankings on a scale from 1 to 5. For example, 'Rank from 1 (strongly disagree) to 5 (strongly agree): I often study or work even in my spare time'. This is a subset of the larger dataset that just focuses on music.

context.potentialUses: For example, predict someone's personality traits based on other traits.
context.potentialMisuses: Using demographic information from a limited dataset to make assumptions about subgroups of people: for example, asking predictions about which genders are more likely to have which fears.

fields.description: I am afraid of Dangerous dogs
I am afraid of  public speaking
